Title: Confessions
Plot: The gang are on the verge of completing a job but Albert's gone AWOL. When he finally appears it's all too late because 'the mark' has pulled out - but Albert has a new plan.
GuestStars: Stewart Harwood, Rebecca Lacey, Stanley Townsend, Flaminia Cinque, Phil Atkinson, Maryann Turner, Andrew Havill, Guy Henry, Brett Fancy
